instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
Hey all I have a A1706 here no liquid and just started flashing folder. I'm using the 820-00239 view. 
U8600 is getting very hot to the touch.
Here are some voltages hope this makes sence.
PP0V9_SSD_REG                  0.9
PP1V8_SSD_COLD               1.8
PP3V3_S5_SSD                     3.3
PP1V2_SSD_COLD               1.2
PPVIN_2V7_NAND_LB         12.13
PP1V2_SSD_HOT                  1.2
PP1V8_SSD_HOT                  1.8
PP3V3_2V7_NAND_VCC      3.3

Hope I'm starting to supply the correct info! Thank you

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
I bet the schematic link was already posted on the forum.
Check this, just in case.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C-xBnPpb-5dS4wQ-x82Zph3cPhGfqTYj/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

"PPVIN_2V7_NAND_LB         12.13"
Incorrect PPBUS_G3H, so you have another problem on the board.

Post J9600 voltages; pins 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, 36, 46.
Be sure to have good contacts at J9600.

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message: Havent had a chance to get this back in yet. Forst of the week thank you I will send info

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
I now have 13.1 v on g3h and on the nand line. U8600 is getting hot  :( 
I'm going to check for shorts around there. 
Thank you sofar for your input.

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
I have a pp0v9 short_ssd_reg  short! 
Dont see any bad looking caps of off stuff.
I removed  L9321 and L9320 to make sure it wasnt the other line. And it stayed where it was, 
I'm thinking U8600, but are there any common places this line shorts before I go digging at that chip? Thank you

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message: If there is pure short, you should be able to heat the culprit injecting 1V; 20A PSU may be needed.

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
Yes injected 1v and  only get to 5a but it got hot. Couldn't touch it. 
Can we source this chip?

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message: Scrap board is the best solution...

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message:
You must make stock buying bulk from Aliexpress, 2-3 boards for several models.
You can get better price contacting sellers directly.

threads.title: 820-00923--a flashing folder
threads.message: Yes we do that now. 8 weeks is long time to wait for a board to come to Canada  :( thank you for your help!!
